item.title: Hello!
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: Welcome! This is Zelong Kuang 🇨🇳 from Univerisity of Melbourne. I am currently a Year 1 student at Bachelor of Science, majoring in pure mathematics.

item.title: My Doom Configuration
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: Doom modules Modules Doom has this lovely modular configuration base that takes a lot of work out of configuring Emacs. Each module (when enabled) can provide a list of packages to install (on doom sync) and configuration to be applied. The modules can also have flags applied to tweak their behaviour. ;;; init.el -*- lexical-binding: t; -*- ;; This file controls what Doom modules are enabled and what order they load in.

item.title: windows-11 Pro-education edition activation
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: 使用激活码 J8WVF-9X3GM-4WVYC-VDHQG-42CXT 若是无法激活成功则使用 admin 打开 powershell 输入 irm massgrave.dev/get | iex 后分别输入 7 1 1 重启 再次打开 powershell 输入 irm massgrave.dev/get | iex 输入 1 即可激活
